committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to transfer certain public lands in Nevada to the Toiyabe, Humboldt, and Inyo National Forests.
short_title: National Forests of Nevada Enhancement Act of 1986

summary.text: National Forests of Nevada Enhancement Act of 1986 - Transfers specified public lands in Nevada to the Secretary of Agriculture for inclusion in the Toiyabe, Humboldt, and Inyo National Forests. Requires lands designated for inclusion in such Forests to be managed according to whether or not they have been designated for or released from inclusion as wilderness. States that water rights and mineral resources management remain unaffected by this Act.

titles.title: National Forests of Nevada Enhancement Act of 1986
A bill to transfer certain public lands in Nevada to the Toiyabe, Humboldt, and Inyo National Forests.
